title: Remarks upon a book lately published by Dr. Will. Sherlock ... entituled, A modest examination of the Oxford decree, &c.
author: Edwards, Jonathan, 1629-1712.
publisher: Printed at the Theater, and are to be sold by H. Clements,
notes: Concerns the debate over the nature of the Trinity.
Attributed to Jonathan Edwards. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
